subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chauncey Billups, the Detroit Pistons’ point guard and the 2004 N.B.A. finals most valuable player, has committed 17 turnovers in the first three games of the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: Chauncey Billups, the Detroit Pistons’ point guard and the 2004 N.B.A. finals most valuable player, has committed 17 turnovers in the first three games of the Eastern Conference finals.
